original_body_lines: The Hotel Suppliers Association (HSA) has extended its heartfelt congratulations to Anura Kumara Dissanayake on his election as the ninth Executive President of Sri Lanka.
“This momentous achievement reflects the trust and confidence the people of this great nation have placed in your leadership,” said HSA President Azad Mansoor in a statement.

“As a vital arm of the hospitality industry, the HSA plays a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth functioning of the supply chain that fuels one of Sri Lanka’s most important sectors – tourism and hospitality. Our industry, renowned for its contribution to the nation’s economic growth, employment generation, and international reputation, depends on a robust and efficient supply network, of which the HSA is proud to be an integral part.” “We believe your vision and commitment to steering Sri Lanka towards prosperity will also help strengthen the hospitality and tourism sectors, particularly as we collectively work towards recovery and growth post-pandemic.

The HSA stands ready to support your initiatives, ensuring that we continue to play our role in promoting excellence in hospitality and elevating Sri Lanka’s standing as a world-class travel destination.”

“Your leadership is key to unlocking the full potential of Sri Lanka’s economy, and we are confident that, under your stewardship, the nation will achieve greater heights of progress, unity, and prosperity.”
“Once again, congratulations, Your Excellency. We wish you all the success in your tenure and look forward to a future of cooperation and mutual development.”
